Wide blouse in a cotton weave with inset lace trims, a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with pin-tucks front and back, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Sleeveless, A-line top in woven fabric with a flounce at the top that continues back over the shoulders, and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.

Slip-on trainers in felt with a frill at the top, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Checked linings and insoles in a contrasting colour, and rubber soles.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a collar and elastic drawstring. Zipped front pockets, a zipped inner pocket, inner ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.

Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets at the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, a frill-trimmed yoke at the back and an embroidered back section in woven fabric.

Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets at the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, a frill-trimmed yoke at the back and an embroidered back section in woven fabric.
Imitation suede monkstraps with a decorative tab with elastic and a metal buckle, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Denim shirt in cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Denim shirt in cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a flounced trim at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a flounced trim at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a hood with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back. Zipped handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the back of the hem. Longer at the back. Lined.
Padded slippers in soft velour with an embroidered motif and appliqués on the front. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck, short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist and tie belt that wraps over at the back. Gently flared skirt with concealed pockets in the side seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
